# Eigenvalues of a Erdos-Renyi Matrix

```{r}
set.seed(23)
P <- RM_erdos(4, p_sparse = 0.5, stoch = F)
```

```{r}
evals <- eval_frame(P)
```

```{r}
it <- 1000
evl_stack <- evals
for(i in 1:it){
  P <- RM_erdos(4, p_sparse = 0.5, stoch = F)
  evl_stack <- rbind(evl_stack, eval_frame(P))
}
```

```{r}
eval_plot(evl_stack)
```
